__e: I-I went to the doctor a week ago, which means, if we use a condom, it's actually safer to have sex with me than it is with someone who says he's negative but then, like, hasn't been tested recently.
The next day, I went to her house, but we didn't do anything because neither of us had a condom.
I mean, when I had sex, we used a condom, and when he had sex, he used a condom, too, right?
